name: Dinari USHY
description: The Dinari USHY dShares token (USHY.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in the iShares Broad USD High Yield Corporate Bond ETF (NYSE Arca: USHY), an exchange-traded fund designed to provide broad exposure to U.S. dollar-denominated high-yield corporate bonds. The ETF includes a diversified portfolio of corporate debt instruments issued by companies across multiple industries. Each USHY.d token is fully backed by a corresponding USHY ETF share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, USHY.d provides investors with access to high-yield corporate bonds, while benefiting from 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
